name: Walking
details: Walking is a great way to improve or maintain your overall health. It can strengthen bones, reduce excess body fat, and boost muscle power and endurance.

name: Running
details: Studies have shown that consistent running can lower blood pressure and resting heart rate, improve blood sugar control, lower triglycerides, and lower cholesterol.

name: Cycling
details: Regular or daily cycling has been found to prevent weight gain, fight depression, and help stave off a host of health problems, including heart disease, cancer, and diabetes.

name: Planks
details: Planks are perfect for burning belly fat because they engage multiple muscles at once, boosting the metabolic rate and benefiting core strength.

name: Side Planks
details: Side planks work the deep spinal stabilizing muscle quadratus lumborum . Keeping this muscle strong can help reduce your risk of a back injury.

name: Pushups
details: The push-up helps to build muscle and improve strength throughout the upper body. It targets the muscles in your chest , arms and the shoulders.

name: Sit Ups
details: When you do sit-ups every day, your back and hip muscles become more flexible. A flexible back and hips improve circulation, as well as reduce stress.

name: Swimming
details: Just 30 minutes of swimming three times per week can boost your energy levels through increased metabolic rate. Exercising without the sweat

name: Yoga
details: Yoga has been found to improve quality of life, reduce stress, anxiety, insomnia, depression and back pain.
